[Your name]: ...avoid any unexpected financial surprises during the project. By paying 100% upfront, you're also demonstrating a strong commitment to the success of the project, which fosters a better working relationship between our teams.

[Your name]: We understand that trust is an important factor in this decision. To put your mind at ease, I'd like to share some testimonials and case studies from our past clients who have chosen the 100% upfront payment option. Their experiences will give you a better understanding of the quality and reliability of our services.

[Your name]: We also recognize that some clients might have concerns about the flexibility and control over the project. Rest assured, our team is dedicated to your satisfaction, and we're more than happy to accommodate any changes or adjustments throughout the project. The full upfront payment will not affect our commitment to delivering the best possible results for your business.

[Your name]: I hope this offer has piqued your interest. By choosing the 100% upfront payment option and receiving the 10% discount, you'll not only save money but also help us streamline the process and deliver your sales funnel more efficiently. Please take some time to consider this opportunity, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns.
